pageContext.claim: “Right now, they're building many, many steel plants. All of them -- Nucor, U.S. Steel -- they're building many plants. They hadn't built a plant in 40 years.”
pageContext.analysis: This is exaggerated. Trump previously claimed, falsely, that U.S. Steel was building six to eight new plants. This is another version of that claim. Some mills have reopened and some plans for new plants have been announced, but industry analysts do not see this as a revival.
